title: Minaya's makeover continues
subtitle: Singer: Minaya's big makeover
body: Omar Minaya's extreme makeover was almost finished. He'd nipped and tucked the Mets for months. Just some cosmetic change, that's all that remained.  So, on Saturday, he applied a little Jorge Julio. And now the veil is ready to come off on a transformed team that won't start play with the same old National League East hopes, but with expectations.  The final domino toppled with Julio and right-handed prospect John Maine being acquired from Baltimore for Kris and Anna Benson. Tom Singer is a reporter for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
